alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Jasper; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 3:26PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...HAZARDOUS SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, EFFINGHAM, CHATHAM, BEAUFORT AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 325 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated hazardous showers along a line extending from near Springfield to 8 miles west of Richmond Hill, and moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of these showers include... Pooler, Bluffton, Richmond Hill, Ridgeland, Springfield, Bellinger Hill Area, Savannah International Airport and Midtown Savannah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
